message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth $12,000 to both of us. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for it. I believe this is a fair offer considering its value to both parties.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. I believe this is still a fair price given its value to both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. To continue our discussion, I would like to propose a price of $10,750 for the product. This offers a slight compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
